message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $100 at this time.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $140 is still more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to go up to $120. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $130. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
